Structs/CalendarView.html#/s:15YCalendar.name: minimumDate
Structs/CalendarView.html#/s:15YCalendar.abstract: Optional minimum date. Dates before the minimum cannot be selected. nil means no minimum (default).

Structs/CalendarView.html#/s:15YCalendar.name: maximumDate
Structs/CalendarView.html#/s:15YCalendar.abstract: Optional maximum date. Dates beyond the maximum cannot be selected. nil means no maximum (default).

Structs/CalendarView.html#/s:15YCalendar.name: bookedDates
Structs/CalendarView.html#/s:15YCalendar.abstract: Optional booked dates. These dates cannot be selected.

Structs/CalendarMonthItem.html#/s:15YCal.name: isGrayedOut
Structs/CalendarMonthItem.html#/s:15YCal.abstract: Whether date lies outside of the current month.

Structs/CalendarMonthItem.html#/s:15YCal.name: isBooked
Structs/CalendarMonthItem.html#/s:15YCal.abstract: Whether the date has already been booked.

Structs/CalendarMonthItem.html#/s:15YCal.name: isSelectable
Structs/CalendarMonthItem.html#/s:15YCal.abstract: Returns true if the date can be selected in a month calendar, otherwise false.

Structs/CalendarMonthItem.html.name: CalendarMonthItem
Structs/CalendarMonthItem.html.abstract: Information about a single day in a month.

Extensions/Int.html#/s:Si15YCalendarPick.abstract: Performs the modulus (not the remainder) operation on the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: startDateOfMonth()
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns start Date of the given date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: endDateOfMonth()
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns end Date of the given date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: numberOfDaysInMonth()
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns a Int number of days for selected month.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: previousDate()
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns previous Date of the given date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: nextDate()
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns next Date of the given date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: date(byAddingDays:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns a Date created by adding/removing the number of days.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: date(byAddingMonth:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns a Date created by adding/removing the number of months.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: date(byAddingYear:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns a Date created by adding/removing the number of years.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isYesterday
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within yesterday, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isToday
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within today, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isTomorrow
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within tomorrow, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isLastWeek
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within last week, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isThisWeek
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within current week, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isNextWeek
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within next week, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isLastMonth
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within last month, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isThisMonth
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within current month, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isNextMonth
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within next month, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isLastYear
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within last year, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isThisYear
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within current year, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isNextYear
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns true if the given date is within next year, as defined by the calendar and calendar’s locale.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isSameDay(as:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Determines whether two dates both fall on the same day.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isSameWeek(as:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Determines whether two dates both fall on the same week.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isSameMonth(as:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Determines whether two dates both fall on the same month.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isSameYear(as:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Determines whether two dates both fall on the same year.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: timeElapsed(relativeTo:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns the time elapsed in String from the given date to the relative date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: dateOnly
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns a new Date representing the date calculated by setting hour, minute, and second

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: toString(withFormatType:timeZone:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Converts the date to string based on a date format

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: toString(withTemplate:locale:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Converts the date to string based on a provided template

Extensions/Typography.html.abstract: Default typographies for the Month Calendar Picker

Enums/DateFormatType.html#/s:15YCalendar.name: isoYear
Enums/DateFormatType.html#/s:15YCalendar.abstract: The ISO8601 formatted year “yyyy” i.e. 2022

Enums/DateFormatType.html#/s:15YCalendar.name: isoYearMonth
Enums/DateFormatType.html#/s:15YCalendar.abstract: The ISO8601 formatted year and month “yyyy-MM” i.e. 2022-06

Enums/DateFormatType.html#/s:15YCalendar.abstract: The ISO8601 formatted date “yyyy-MM-dd” i.e. 2022-06-05

Enums/DateFormatType.html#/s:15YCalendar.abstract: The ISO8601 formatted date, time and sec “yyyy-MM-dd’T'HH:mm:ssZ” i.e. 2022-06-05T19:20:30+01:00

Enums/DateFormatType.html#/s:15YCalendar.name: isoDateTimeFull
Enums/DateFormatType.html#/s:15YCalendar.abstract: The ISO8601 formatted date, time and millisec “yyyy-MM-dd’T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ” i.e. 2022-06-05T19:20:30.45+01:00

Enums/DateFormatType.html#/s:15YCalendar.name: httpHeader
Enums/DateFormatType.html#/s:15YCalendar.abstract: The http header formatted date “EEE, d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss ZZZ” i.e. “Sun, 5 Jun 2022 19:20:30 +0530”

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance/Day/De.name: normal
Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance/Day/De.abstract: Default appearance for days within the current month

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance/Day/De.name: grayed
Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance/Day/De.abstract: Default appearance for days outside of the current month

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance/Day/De.abstract: Default appearance for days outside enabled range

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.name: monthStyle
Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.abstract: Foreground color and typography for month (and year)

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.name: defaultPreviousImage
Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.abstract: Default image for previous month button. Is a left chevron from SF Symbols in template rendering mode

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.name: defaultNextImage
Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.abstract: Default image for next month button. Is a right chevron from SF Symbols in template rendering mode

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.name: tintColor
Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.abstract: Default tint color for Calendar Picker (a purple color that adjusts for dark mode).

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.name: onTintColor
Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.abstract: Foreground color to use against tint color

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.name: bookedColor
Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.abstract: Background color to use for booked dates

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.name: onBookedColor
Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.abstract: Foreground color to use against booked color

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.name: secondaryLabel
Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.abstract: A secondary label color that has .AA contrast vs .systemBackground in regular mode

Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.name: quaternaryLabel
Classes/CalendarPicker/Appearance.html#/.abstract: A quaternary label color that has 2.0 contrast vs .systemBackground in regular mode
